item.title: Mike Tomlin is out as head coach; what's next for Steelers?
item.description: Who could replace Tomlin, how does this impact Aaron Rodgers and the QB position, and more questions.

item.title: Tomlin ends 19-year run as Steelers head coach
item.description: Mike Tomlin has stepped down as Steelers coach, ending a 19-year run in Pittsburgh during which he never had a losing season.

item.title: Eagles make change at OC after offense's decline
item.description: The Eagles have removed Kevin Patullo from the offensive coordinator's role, the team announced Tuesday.

item.title: Bolts fire OC Roman, OL coach after playoff exit
item.description: The Chargers have fired offensive coordinator Greg Roman and offensive line coach Mike Devlin after their playoff exit, the team announced Tuesday.

item.title: Man United name Carrick boss until end of season
item.description: Manchester United have appointed former player Michael Carrick as their head coach until the end of the season, the club confirmed Tuesday.
